website_summaries.verdict: Larger men looking for a "big and tall" option will find their match in this impressive down model.
pros: Includes separate bag for conveniently packing jacket
Offered in smaller sizes and a variety of colors
cons: Down can sneak out of seams after heavy use

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but is cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Today makes the 3rd time I've worn this jacket and it's already leaking down from the sleeves, and elsewhere. When I move my arm a little cloud of down magically appears. When I sit down wearing this jacket another mysterious cloud of down fills the air. Looks great but is cheaply made, and be advised regardless of the brand most seem to be made in China and have the same material description/ composition: Shell: 100% Nylon Imported Machine Wash Channel-quilted zip-front jacket featuring side-entry hand pockets and down feather padding Logo at left chest Standing collar Comes with drawstring bag for packing jacket Origin: China
customer_reviews.author: C-Dog

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect. The quality is very good
customer_reviews.text: Hi. I'm 1.73m & 75kg - and I purchased S. Fit perfect. The quality is very good. I bought in Gold color, but it is little bit darker than on photo. I like it! Thanks TH!
customer_reviews.author: Vasil

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this jacket for my friend, he did not have any special requests. I chose this jacket because of the price. In colour Port it was the cheapest. I did not expect anything special, just a good quality jacket. And I was very impressed when I got it! Premium quality jacket! Beautiful deep rich color, better than it is on the picture. Excellent quality material. I wanted to leave a review and recommend to buy this jacket. If you find this review helpfull - please push the help full button under my review.
customer_reviews.author: Nataly

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, lightweight (and see measurements)
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, lightweight, high quality. For size M: armpit to armpit: 60 cm, shoulder to shoulder (straight line): 48 cm, sleeve length from shoulder: 67 cm, back length in center from lower end of collar to hem: 68,5 cm. I made these measurements myself, but before purchasing I encountered with various measurements provided by sellers on ebay. Filler (on the tag): 90% duck down, 10% waterfowl feathers.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksey I.

customer_reviews.title: Down
customer_reviews.text: Size is good, it fit properly. But the quality is too low. We all know this jacket is filled with down but the problem is you can actually see this. They started to come out from the first day. Now I throw feather everywhere I go. You can see the situation from pictures. This is unexpected for o brand like Tommy-Hilfiger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad material Tiny holes
customer_reviews.text: Bad material. Only used it for a few times because winter has just started here in Peru and many tiny holes have appeared and the feathers come out of them everyday. I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA B.

customer_reviews.title: I love this jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I love this Jacket. Only real complaint I have about this jacket is that I tore it the first time I wore it. I should have been more careful. I think a roofing tac actually was the culprit. My dog jumps up on me all the time. He weighs around 100 lbs. His nails don't do any damage to my jacket though. But all in all, it's the warmest and lightest jacket I have. I used it in 20 degree fahrenheit while camping and it was about as expected. I was warm under the jacket but in that kind of cold it was hard to keep the rest of me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Lee Cain

customer_reviews.title: Attractive light down jacket - came defective
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to wear it in the autumn afternoon yet, but it is comfortable but runs a bit large. If you are wearing a sweater under the jacket it should fit pretty well UPDATE: wore my jacket for the first time only to discover that the cord to tighten up the bottom was cut and because the weather just turned cold I am a week past the return even though I am wearing it for the first time. If you are preparing for colder weather but haven’t worn it yet, make sure you check so you don’t get stuck like me
customer_reviews.author: LifeScore

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'1 198 lbs. with a 36 inch waist. I'm somewhat hard to fit as my chest and shoulders are an XL but everything else is a Large so Getting something too baggy is hard to avoid. I bought a large and was afraid it would be tight. I can wear sweaters and a hoodie and this jacket fits perfect! UPDATE Jacket still is nice. I dont have the problems of down feathers pluming everytime I move. I think Crushed older feathers in jackets do that. Depends on what you get.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelGTDriver

customer_reviews.title: Loved the Jacket - Falling Apart After 2 Months
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks of the jacket, the feel of the jacket, and the not-so-bad price. Unfortunately today on the drive into work I noticed feathers already coming out of the arms of the jacket, and prior to that had a few strings pop up which needed trimming. I may seek a replacement for this jacket, as two months of wear to work (office job) should not result in this much wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Eiskina

customer_reviews.title: Not 👎
customer_reviews.text: do not buy! from this jacket inside is a duck fluff! you do not fawn black is bad! it is very very not nice
customer_reviews.author: Iren

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Not very good quality. I've only worn twice and you can see in the pictures that the stitching is already coming apart. The elastic on sleeve on right side is now now fitting properly because falling apart on that side. Again, this after wearing only twice for a couple of hrs. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erwin cordero

customer_reviews.title: Serious Quality Control Issue...
customer_reviews.text: It's a shame that this is coming from a brand such as Tommy Hilfiger, but do not purchase this item unless you like the feathers from the inside of the jacket coming out and getting all over your shirt and chair as you can see from the pictures provided. The only reason this jacket gets two stars rather than one is because it is actually a good looking jacket, too bad you won't be to wear it though.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket (well worth the cost!)
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5' 8" and weigh 155 pounds. I bought the medium size (standard), and it fits perfectly! I can wear a sweater underneath it and still be comfortable and have flexibility. The collar is just the right size – not too high and not too low. This jacket is medium weight but keeps me warm in cooler outdoor temperatures. A matching color sack is included for easy packing/carrying. I highly recommend this great jacket!
customer_reviews.author: R. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other reviews , this is cheaply made. Feathers fall out from day 1. Doesnt look like Tommy Hilfiger brand
customer_reviews.author: Kr9999

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this jacket
customer_reviews.text: Perfect jacket.... My husband is elderly, and the heavy duty jacket, with a liner that I bought him from a well known clothing company was awfully heavy for him. So, I thought I would try the Tommy Hilfiger Packable down jacket. It is a great coat, he really likes it. We live in Indiana, where we have cold and windy weather. This jacket is comfortably warm, and fits well, and is very lightweight. I read where others have said the feathers keep coming out...he has never experienced this happening. This jacket is stylish, and well made. He is well pleased with this nice jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Slysleuth

customer_reviews.title: Leaking feathers all from inside
customer_reviews.text: Returned it because there were feathers all over my inside shirt or T-shirt. When shaked off, the tiny feathers fly everywhere.... poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this jacket as a birthday gift. When my husband opened it, we immediately saw a 5 inch tear along the zipper seam. There were no tags on the jacket. The bag for the jacket had been removed instead of being attached to the jacket. It appeared that the jacket had bern worn and returned without proper inspection. I immediately received a replacement jacket 3 days later. This jacket is perfect and he loves it. I’d give it 5 stars, except for all the issues we had with the original jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but duck feathers comes out
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this in Jan & gifted my dad, then one in March and gifted my brother thinking this was a superb jacket because it looks really great. I finally purchased now for myself. I got allergy the very first day. I observed that there were duck feathers coming out of the jacket, though I dont see any rips or tears. Then i checked with my dad & brother. They had the same issue but they never told because I gifted then with love.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Warmth without the weight
customer_reviews.text: The jacket was a gift and the recipient says that he is very pleased thus far, as it isn't winter here yet and that will be the real test. These type of jackets usually offer excellent warmth without being heavy and bulky. At first we thought that the jacket appeared to be a bit too loose at the hip and probably not very good at keeping out the cold, but shortly discovered a draw on the inside allowing for adjustment. This is actually better, as he can change it to accommodate whatever else that he is layering underneath!
customer_reviews.author: Pati Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Deep Navy is significantly darker than shown online
customer_reviews.text: Owned the same jacket in a dark navy blue. Got a rip. Decided to get the same jacket, just go lighter, and purchased "deep navy" as that appeared to be several shades lighter but still a navy blue. Product arrived. Its the same jacket, with perhaps slightly narrower cut in body and arms... A drop more fitted. However, its a significantly darker navy blue than shown on the website (super bright illumination in the studio I guess). Good jacket though.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Tommy Down Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Saw this jacket at a local outlet for tommy. Really liked the fit - it's true to size with some room for layering (so if you don't want to layer maybe order a size down). This jacket is physically VERY light (literally feels like you are not wearing anything) but seems to be very warm. Was way more expensive at the store - if you can get it for under $70 it's a steal (store price was $169 with 40% off at the time). Highly recommend this one for very cold fall Weather.
customer_reviews.author: CClife

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for travelers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a recent trip to Europe, and it worked great. It was very warm on 35-40 f evening walks to restaurants and events. But most importantly, it rolls up into the included bag that fits in my suitcase with minimal space (about 12" long and about 5" diameter (XXL). When it is taken out of the travel bag, it looks good (not wrinkled or creased).
customer_reviews.author: Willie TEXAS

customer_reviews.title: Grat Deal on This Stylish Jacket
customer_reviews.text: My grandson put this jacket on his Amazon Wish List for Christmas. It is so stylish and fits perfectly. The price is half of the list price. Not as warm as I would want for a Massachusetts winter, but this is the first jacket he has worn for a couple of years - he was previously only wearing a down vest. Eighteen year olds must have a higher metabolism than grandmothers!
customer_reviews.author: jayner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Jacket for 20-40 degrees
customer_reviews.text: I have a nice warm jacket for very cold weather, 20's and below, and light jackets for 40 and above, but needed something when it got to the 30's. I ordered this, hoping for the best and it is the bomb. Although it is extremely light and can pack down into a small pouch, I have worn it in 20 -40 degrees and it is very warm. The large fit me (5' 9" 185 lbs) very well. Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M

customer_reviews.title: Buy this for a dude in your life
customer_reviews.text: 6’1 size medium fits perfect 19 inch shoulders, I’m slim and this jacket is light. one of my favorite jackets to wear at night or during winter now. Somewhat water proof. everyone wants to know where I got it. Better looking than my Columbia or north face puffer jackets. After months of use I doubt any feathers will come out now like some people are complaining about
customer_reviews.author: Justin Buccio

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Jacket but way to many feathers....
customer_reviews.text: First off I want to say from when i got this jacket, I absolutely loved it. It fit great, feels great and was one of the best jacket purchases ive ever made. The only downside to this jacket, is the constant feathers that poke out and fly around as well as get stuck to your clothing. It gets pretty annoying after wearing the jacket having all the feathers and material stuck to your shirt. Maybe I received a faulty jacket or maybe this is how they are but it's made me not want to wear it as much, which is a bummer because it looks and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: JMolina

customer_reviews.title: Real packable down
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jacket. I looked at similar jackets in stores, but none of those were down. Down is lighter and warmer than polyester. This is so light and warm and silky. I've wanted a packable down jacket for a long time and am only sorry I waited this long. The quality seems fine to me. Some feathers do come out, but only the usual amount for a down coat.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Miller

customer_reviews.title: The jacket is very beautiful and very light
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is very beautiful and very light. BUT there are many places where between the seams sticks out fluff. I pointed the arrows at the photo. I also didn't like the big space around my neck. The jacket does not protect the neck from the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket for the price! Fits true and keeps you warm.
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket. Lightweight, comfortable and stylish. Fits closer to the belt line than other jackets, but I was looking for that. Easily packable to take on the go in a backpack. Keeps you warm and is great for cool nights. Light enough that it doesn’t overheat you, but insulated enough that it keeps you comfortably warm.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Sheds...bad. unzips itself
customer_reviews.text: It's awful. It sheds feathers EVERYWHERE! Update. 2 weeks later and now it comes unzipped from the bottom up while riding bike. This is the worst jacket I have ever had. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: robert teague

customer_reviews.title: Great style but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn it for two weeks. Keeps me warm on a chilly morning about 44F. I like the comfort, style, color, and portability. However, lots of goose feather sheds on to my clothes and pants. Great style and fit but poor quality. I guess you get what you pay for...expected more from a Tommy Hilfiger brand.
customer_reviews.author: dice6

customer_reviews.title: Nice cool weather jacket
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, warm enough for the low 60's or so. Runs a little tight on me. I'm normally somewhere between a large and x-large. The large is a little snug particularly if I wear a long sleeve flannel shirt underneath. However, I like the jacket and it seems to be made very well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sabes

customer_reviews.title: Decent Jacket for warmer winter days
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't recommend this in blizzard conditions or sub zero conditions unless you layer, but it is a great everyday winter jacket if you don't want a lot of bulk for driving. Zippers can be frustrating they tend to get stuck quite often, seems like a design flaw. When there are deals it's a good value.
customer_reviews.author: PhoneGuru84

customer_reviews.title: Nice what if jacket
customer_reviews.text: This actually fits the size they say it is. Great job TH. I thought this would be bulkier than it is but presently surprised. The stuff sack is included. Very nice looking jacket. Will keep mine bagged up in my vehicle during winter months just in case. Takes up no room and it is cheap insurance.
customer_reviews.author: JAFAH

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this jacket unless you want to be continually washing your shirts and sweaters.....
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned a jacket that leaves more down on my shirt than is in the jacket. I know I’m past due on returns. I really thought this would stop. However I realize now that it never will. I would like the manufacturer to know what a disaster this product really is.... My shirts get washed a lot.
customer_reviews.author: edlev

customer_reviews.title: So many feathers
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to keep it so badly but right out of the bag, there were so many feathers sticking out on the jacket, I decided to return it. Ordered a small for my 170 lbs 5'10.5 height hubby who is athletic built. The fit was perfect, a medium would have been too big, wish it was better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Beachlover

customer_reviews.title: Filling is down which is a terribly cruel industry
customer_reviews.text: My brother bought this jacket for me but when I saw that its filling was natural down, I returned it immediately because I can't support and industry that is so cruel and disgusting. For those of you that don't know, they sadistically pluck the feathers from live geese without any anesthesia or any consideration for the birds. They repeat the same process once these birds grow feathers again. These birds are tortured until their deaths. No being in this planet deserves a life like that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very upset by the quality of this jacket
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product does not match the brand. I am very upset, it seems to me that I bought a fake and not the original. I ordered this product to another region, and after receiving the opportunity to return it was no longer possible. The main problem is that after putting on clothes under the jacket there is a lot of fluff left, and when you come to the office, take off your jacket they look at you like a duck !!!! and at the seams hung a lot of threads that had to be pulled and cut
customer_reviews.author: Serhii

customer_reviews.title: Good , but not warm enough for under 40
customer_reviews.text: Everything looks good, except it is not as warm as the similar one I bought from COSTCO 3yrs ago, I paid double though (...guess this is why you can't find anywhere on what warm level is for this jacket...) i think it is perfect for 40-50 degree, not warm enough for under 40... other than that, perfect! Made in Vietnam / 90% duck down 10% waterfowl feathers
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Solid option for a big guy 3XL
customer_reviews.text: As a big/taller guy, it’s hard to find a travel, packable down-jacket. I bought the 3XL and Tommy has larger size options. If you are looking for this, it’s a solid buy. I didn’t give it a 5 star, and the build is kind of on the cheap side, loose threads, losing some feathers. However, it’s priced that way.
customer_reviews.author: TDubW

customer_reviews.title: Was delievered in my hands great service its really a good product but its not ...
customer_reviews.text: Was delievered in my hands great service its really a good product but its not worth the 60 something dollars more like ,maybe 40 because it wasnt the same color it came to me lighter then expected .Might buy another thing from this product if they bring the price down. Now lets hope my cat doesn't sleep on it!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Narvaez

customer_reviews.title: Feathers flying EVERYWHERE. RUINING SHIRTS!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best jacket i ever wore and i love it...except that it had bad stitching and feathers go any and every where. when i wear it, there will be a whole ton of feathers that stick to whatever clothes im wearing. With so many feathers on my clothes, it hard to wipe them off. im going to return and reorder, hopefully they dont send me another bad done.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Dope
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is very lightweight and warm. Comes with a bag to stuff it into when not using. Very well made. Like all down jackets sometimes a few tiny feathers will come out but that is to be expected when owning a down jacket. Going to buy the black one soon.
customer_reviews.author: ljd86045

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent sizing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 2XLT for my husband. It was Midlight color and made in China. The fitting was loose and long. So I exchanged for a 2XL in Olive color. This one was made in Vietnam, and very tight in chest and waist. The chest size was measured at least 3" smaller than the first one. Well maybe different manufactures size differently. So the third time I ordered the same Midlight color in 2XL. It just came, and it was China made, but was an XLT, wrong size sent! This inconsistent sizing among manufactures (for the same jacket!) and Amazon's mess up in dispatch handling are really frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaodan Huang

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the Feathers!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this jacket, but! The feathers that come out of it is ridiculous. It’s great if all you wear are white, beige, or gray sweaters or shirts, because no one will notice the feathers. I bought my wife a Columbia puffy jacket...NO FEATHERS. Hmmm?
customer_reviews.author: Roy T. Benear

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jacket
customer_reviews.text: With winter coming, this jacket will be well used by spring. The price seems very good for what you get. I don't know what the person who packed the shipping box was thinking because the very large box that the jacket came in would hold six of them.
customer_reviews.author: JandJ

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight but plenty warm!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing keeps you warm like a down jacket. I had a hard time finding one in my size (3X). This one arrived and it was just what I hoped it would be. It is so light weight and non-bulky. Couldn't be more pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery L. Stockford

customer_reviews.title: Well fitted for taller men.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this coat. He is 17 and 6’4 and the fit is perfect in him. The sleeves are plenty long enough and the fit is not too snug nor too big. Although he is a bigger guy I hate when clothes look sloppy or too big and this does neither! It’s warm enough for the colder months as well as not too hot when it’s only a little chilly outside.
customer_reviews.author: shaundrajoy

customer_reviews.title: Very Warm. Nice fit. Light. Down feathers tend to shed a bit l.
customer_reviews.text: It was 32 degree F the other day so I was finally able to test it out. Wow the warmth. My body generates a lot of heat so the down really did its thing and kept me insulated. One downside I noticed is that down does tend to shed every once in a while and there is loose threading in a couple of places, but nothing that compromises the jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Friendship Jim

customer_reviews.title: Very good looking, light jacket for shoulder seasons.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice jacket. Packable, so on the light fluffy side. Very comfortable. Order a size slightly larger, to accommodate sweatshirt for cooler days. Great for transition seasons. Doubt will be the jacket of choice if below freezing, but we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Greg N from NYC

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and comfortable. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: Love this coat. It fits great with no binding. I like that it is really warm but is still wearable inside stores without getting too warm too soon. You do get a stray feather but so far not bad at all. I would definitely buy this again. I haven't tried to pack it into the storage bag but I have no doubt it will fit. Very comfortable and light weight. You don't even feel like you have a coat on. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Larry S

customer_reviews.title: Size labels do not match.
customer_reviews.text: Prior to ordering this jacket in the cement color, I ordered this jacket in a green color that fit well. I ordered this jacket in a L (large) size like the green one, but this one is too big. This jacket has an XL label inside the jacket while there is a L size label hanging from the sleeve. I am very disappointed with this order. I am not going to the trouble to return this garment.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: It’s not well made
customer_reviews.text: Lost my eyeglasses and credit cards because Tommy Hilfiger designed holes, i.e., 2.5 inch openings at the bottom of bith of the inside pockets. I’m pissed and won’t buy Hilfiger label again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill James

customer_reviews.title: I loved the design and quality of this product
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color and using Tommy brand looks fantastic. It calls the attention and the price was very accessible. The quality and design are fantastic and I want to order another color
customer_reviews.author: Alberth Chacón

customer_reviews.title: ... had this identical coat and my father-in-law wanted one like it. My husband had purchased his in store ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband had this identical coat and my father-in-law wanted one like it. My husband had purchased his in store at an outlet mall. I was happy to find one on Amazon for my father-in-law. My husband loves being able to pack his in the small bag and packing in the suitcase as we travel and it gives him the option to throw in his backpack while hiking in case of emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Best jacket I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: Honestly one of my favorite jackets I’ve ever owned, I’m studying in a very cold place upstate NY and this time of year, it can drop to 10°, so with this I began to collect some warm winter gear. I had this jacket in my cart for a while and then noticed one day... it was the deal of the day! $53.00 for this jacket, I should’ve bought 4!! Nonetheless, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Depola

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just warm enough for cold winter nights in Southern California. Yes we do get them. Don’t think it would be warm enough for snow. It is very light weight and comfortable to wear. Not waterproof, but perhaps a short light drizzle.
customer_reviews.author: Pat32

customer_reviews.title: Right weight & size
customer_reviews.text: Nice & light. Comfortable. I have a 46” chest and a sleeve length of 34”. XL fits perfectly. Insulation is good for fall. Will have to see how cold it can be before I need something warmer. It might be a good layer under a polartech jacket?
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Powers

customer_reviews.title: Fell in love even though I hate this style of jacket
customer_reviews.text: I typically hate this style. I was reaching out on a limb through prime wardrobe and I fell on love. It protects against the wind very well and keeps you warm while being reasonably priced and easily packable. For once it fit my long torso and arms as well.
customer_reviews.author: John Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Packable Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is extremely good looking, fits well, warm and lightweight, good price and my husband really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Hey good looking>
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a compact outer layer jacket for traveling purposes, Great style and color combo with next day delivery. This pic shows the darker color of the grey in response to a question from a customer about whether the grey color was light or dark.
customer_reviews.author: j.v.

customer_reviews.title: Might not be authenticate.
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket but I don’t think it is a real TH. The build quality is not great but it will keep you warm.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bittan

customer_reviews.title: Good coat, could be a bit longer
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a 4xltall to be just a bit taller. It's a xmas present for my incredibly tall son. We'll keep it, as it's a great price and it's just long enough. Width is good and arms are plenty long for a tall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packable!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the style , color and how warm it is without being heavy, it’s very light and I also love that’s totally packable! Didn’t have to wear it until I arrived NYC, so I kept it in by backpack. Didn’t have to wear it during my flight! Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color is much different than Amazon picture
customer_reviews.text: I like the jacket but the color that is represented in the Amazon provided image is FAR lighter than the actual product. I got the New Navy but it is very dark and not at all like the Amazon picture. So, heads up.
customer_reviews.author: NickB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves the color and the fit. He was someone always resistant to a down jacket as he thought they’d be too puffy, but this is sleek and comfy. It keeps him nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Finest018

customer_reviews.title: Sheds Down
customer_reviews.text: Owned it for 3 months. Pros: Looks good. Fits well. Warm in Chicago winter. Cons: Outer skin warps at collar; looks like heat singed plastic. Sheds down-filling at a steady slow pace; it's all over the car seat; annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Rukhmi Bhat

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this jacket as a gift for my husband. Just perfect to wear indoors on a cold Winter day or outside when it gets warmer. Bought for our trip to Disney this month because it can pack easily into the stuff bag that it came with to carry in a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad investment
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s so incredibly light but yet still keeps me warm, I wish the outer shell could’ve been some type of water resistant but anyway not bad for the price...
customer_reviews.author: Sean P. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: This is a great jacket! I gave it to my husband as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jacket! I gave it to my husband as a gift and he loves it. He is 6'1" and it is very flattering. I originally bought the L for him, which fit, but did not allow enough room in the shoulders. The XL is perfect. He reports that he especially likes how lightweight it is, while still delivering the right amount of warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: A Great Lightwight Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and was as described. The fit was exactly as I expected it to be. I particularly like this jacket over many others because it has an inside pocket. It also has a very nice (and small) "sack" to store the jacket in while traveling. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly lightweight yet surprisingly warm. The color is less intense than the pictures display; true color is more of a burnt orange. You do find the occasional stay feather on your clothes or jacket; however, that seems to be the norm with true down products.
customer_reviews.author: C.FisherWVU

customer_reviews.title: very useful for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: fits exactly as described. warm, comfortable with high quality materials. tends to loose a lot of feathers, but all down coats do. love the fact that it can be packed in to the small attached bag, make it ideal for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Special care needed for "down appeal," but easy to do.
customer_reviews.text: It is will keep you warm during the winter months, but realize that it's not water proof and will need special care to wash. Search "YouTube" on how to care for down jackets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice coat for cool weather
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking coat. It is lighter weight that I expected but it is a good coat for temps at 32 or above. You probably want something warmer in very cold weather. The style is as shown and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: theschlay

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This jacket fits well and is very comfortable but within an hour of wearing it, it was clearly evident the product quality was very poor as the down feathers are constantly coming out of the jacket. Everytime I wear this jacket there are feathers all over my arms and back when I take it off. I was thoroughly surprised by this as I am an avid fan of Tommy Hilfiger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings.
customer_reviews.text: This jacket fits great. I was all excited and took on my first trip. However, feathers were everywhere. On my other clothes, on the car seat bottom and back. I’ve had down items before but was a bit surprised at how much this shedded.
customer_reviews.author: reagan Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Looks fabulous on my tall, big shoulder, boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my BF, it's a great product to keep in a suitcase if you travel a great deal. It takes little room in the suitcase but it provides a great deal of warmth..
customer_reviews.author: S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!  Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. Fits perfect. Comfortable. Warm. Great deal. It suffered a small tear for no apparent reason. Parched with gorilla tape and I’m back in business. Do take care when storing this jacket as it’s delicate around hard objects.
customer_reviews.author: DrJones

customer_reviews.title: Goose smuggler
customer_reviews.text: There is no obvious tear in the jacket but tiny feathers constantly keep coming out. I always have to give a second look when wearing black under the jacket because it looks like I was smuggling a goose. However, this lite jacket hasnt lost functionality yet. Used it for over 6 months. Looks good from the outside. Love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Vigneshwaran

customer_reviews.title: I purchased two of these coats. The Navy is ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these coats. The Navy is a true navy, and the Royal is not too bright, it is exactly as pictured. The large jackets fit both guys well, one is 6' 2" and slim and the other is 5' 10" and average build. There is plenty of room to layer underneath, they are not bulky at all, and the jackets are very warm. We live in winter 6 months of the year and a warm jacket is a necessity.
customer_reviews.author: duffer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the few extra bucks.
customer_reviews.text: Compact, easy to stuff into the bag. . .just start at a corner and start cramming. It's quite warm for its bulk and so far, no loose feathers to be seen. I love the interior/exterior pockets, which for some reason are absent on many of these thing. Stuffed in the bag it makes a great airline pillow, as well.
customer_reviews.author: StrontiDog

customer_reviews.title: Teenage approved!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage sons. Hilfiger has made a come back with the teens. I bought a black and a grey. It’s a good looking jacket that can be dressed up or dressed down. Though it’s a puffer it has nice clean lines. It’s sporty, yet preppy. Both of them like their jackets very much and say they are very warm and does not feel bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Kistler

customer_reviews.title: Poor Fit & Inaccurate Color
customer_reviews.text: The color shown in the photo is not reflective of the color of the actual product. The actual color is darker and more brownish-orange than you might imagine. This is not a fitted jacket. The cut is big and boxy. If you are on the larger size around the middle, this might be good. I would buy one size down. I returned mine due to the color and fit.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: I thought its one of those useless down jackets!
customer_reviews.text: This down jacket is leaning towards the more expensive side but it is far more better that any other ones I bought. It fits right, super warm, and the material is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cute Joy Rey

customer_reviews.title: Sheds too much.
customer_reviews.text: Coat is okay except the down sheds. Worn over a sweater and the feathers are all over it. I thought this would go away after a few weeks but it has not. Purchased a second coat from a Maine provider. More expensive but does not shed. Would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: GriffonGlade

customer_reviews.title: Not very good!
customer_reviews.text: I dont no who made this but the inside material come out...it is feather ...I going around shading feathers...dont buy this cloth!
customer_reviews.author: seme5

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is so lightweight. It is the perfect jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and also fits well.Great design by Tommy Hilfiger for big and tall men. This jacket is lightweight, packable for travel and warm for all varieties of winter weather. My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.author: John Koppenaal

customer_reviews.title: Great coat
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved the coat. He didn't think it would be warm but he was surprised it was. I might to buy him another in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Poshan

customer_reviews.title: Fake jacket
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors but the material are very cheap and too big to me.
customer_reviews.author: Enoc Caceres

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is really a warm weather coat. It is super warm. I have worn this jacket/coat with just t shirt on days when it is in the 20's to low 30's and was completely warm. The only issue I have with it is the feathers are starting to make their way out. But for the price, you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: John Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: This will be a one and done experience. Upon my first wearing the jacket it is literally birthing down feathers by the hundreds. I am wearing a black shirt underneath and my back is covered with feathers. Do not purchase. Surprising for a Tommy product. Clearly defective.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Great coat at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a winter trip to New Zealand. I needed something easy to pack and light weight. It was perfect. The coat rolls up tight and compact into the bag (included). The coat kept me plenty warm and was easy to put into a backpack when needed. I couldn’t be more pleased. The quality is excellent and the price was very affordable. I would highly recommend this coat.
customer_reviews.author: David N

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket so much I purchase one almost in every color and do keep warm and very good when dirving which is important.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the guy that commutes and hates a heavy winter coat.
customer_reviews.text: My son is big man, size 3xl. He hates heavy winter coats so he would wear a light weight jacket and a hoodie. I brought this coat as Christmas gift and stuffed it in a small box. He was shocked to see a coat stuffed in such a small box. He likes the jacket very much and wants it in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Size is good, it fit properly. But the quality is too low. We all know this jacket is filled with down but the problem is you can actually see this. They started to come out from the first day. Now I throw feather everywhere I go. You can see the situation from pictures.
customer_reviews.author: miracle

customer_reviews.title: Color was amazing. When below 20 degrees
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these coats. Very well made and a light jacket for cold weather. Fit was as expected - bought normal size. Color was amazing. When below 20 degrees, I would wear a heavier coat. Great for walking around in cold weather when you need a coat but not 20 degrees or colder.
customer_reviews.author: Allegiance

customer_reviews.title: Chiken like
customer_reviews.text: The looks is very nice, perhaps at first day of wearing it, noticed some feathers started coming out, not sure in one month i'l be like a chicken. Also, does not cover in a good way below 50 F. i had to put another layer. Maybe this one is good for ocasional / traveling purpose, not for a day to day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Rafa.el.Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old giant of a son says it's the best jacket he has ever had so I'm guessing it's a pretty nice jacket that I will add, wasn't hash on the pocket.. thanks Tommy..
customer_reviews.author: JDN1324

product_meta.title: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Lightweight Water Resistant Packable Down Puffer Jacket (Standard and Big & Tall)
product_meta.description: The packable puffer jacket is stylish and sensible. It comes with screen-printed directions for packing on the inside pocket, as well as a packable bag.
feature_bullets: WARM FEATURES: 100% down feather padding giving the ability to lock in warmth; Featuring a quilted pattern to add style and functionality; Heat is secured within each stitched quilt
PRACTICALITY: A favorable front zipper extending the length of the jacket is featured along with 2 hand pockets; The side entry pockets create a spacious and easily accessible pocket

STYLISH AND POLISHED: The Tommy Hilfiger logo is present on the left chest adding acknowledgement of the brand without being overpowering; The standup collar creates a mature look while adding to the warmth feature of the jacket
EASY TRAVEL AND STORAGE: The packable feature comes from the lightweight accent of the jacket; Storage comes easy with the matching drawstring bag that can conveniently hold the jacket
